description:
Add documentation for the epic context feature to CLAUDE.md.

## Documentation Sections
- New CLI commands (`ticker context`)
- Configuration options
- How context generation works
- When context is skipped
- Troubleshooting context issues

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] CLI command reference added
- [ ] Config options documented with defaults
- [ ] Example workflow documented
- [ ] Troubleshooting section for common issues
- [ ] Architecture notes updated if relevant

## Content to Add
```markdown
## Epic Context

Ticker can pre-generate context documents for epics to reduce redundant exploration.

### Commands
- `ticker context <epic-id>` - Generate/show context
- `ticker context <epic-id> --refresh` - Regenerate
- `ticker context <epic-id> --delete` - Remove

### Configuration
Add to `.ticker/config.json`:
...
```
